sub_title: Lead Consultant - MS D365 Operations (SCM) Procurement | Production | Warehousing
summary:
An ambitious, enthusiastic and distinguished individual, offering over 10+ years of dynamic experience across various facets of client/customer service, ERP implementation, post Go-Live support, consultancy, business process documentation, project plans and software documentation, aspiring for a challenging career.

- Promising experience in business analysis, rolling out ERP and ERP post-GoLive support specially Dynamics AX 2012 RTM, R2, R3 and Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations. 
- Supply chain, manufacturing (process/discrete) and advance warehousing are core area of expertise. 
- Identifying problems/needs and initiate effective solution to meet business and ERP requirement at the same time. 
- Ability to handle multiple functions and activities in a high pressure environment and rigorous deadlines.
- Highly articulate, demonstrating excellent interpersonal skills across all levels including management. 
  Genuine team player; committed to organisational success.
- Build effective personal relationships and networks within the business which contributed to achieving organizational and team success.
- Proficient in Software Documentation and Business user training and Testing manuals such as creating AXTR guides, Axapta task recorded documents, LCS business process modeler etc. 
- Data import/export using Data management. 
- Experience on User role and ERP security while meeting all IT compliance requirements as well as handling other system configuration as System administrator. 
- Ability to drive ERP support cycle as per standard methodologies and ITIL standards. 
- Power BI Dash-boarding and other critical  business status reporting by extracting up-to date data from D365 Finance and Operation.
- Able to drive status from JIRA and smart-sheets for internal and external incident/progress reporting. q
- Ability to train users and get them prepared before UAT, during UAT and even drive on-job training to achieve better user experience and success for a successful ERP roll-out.

projects.title: Caldic D365 Roll-out
projects.description:
Caldic is one of the leading MNC's having headquarter in Netherlands and having footprints across APAC and EMEA Region decided to digitally transformed using Microsoft one-platform.
As a D365 consultant at HSO, my role is to help Caldic with this digital transformation for Dynamics 365 Operations & Overall Supply Chain, helping to integrate with Ecommerce (CRM), Power-platform and in-house built customizations to roll over smoothly by managing changes through Agile methodology.

projects.title: Project Pearl - D365 Fin&Ops Roll out for Manufacturing
projects.description:
Project Pearl is a MS D365 roll out project across APAC region, our team is responsible to roll out, stabilise and transform the older ERP systems used in our manufacturing premises and bring them to advance ERP platform with proper digital transformation roadmap, use of latest gadgets, integrated End-End solution and use of Business intelligence reports (Power BI).

Since Oct 2019, despite COVID-19 challenges, me and my team has completed successful roll out in;
- Ansell Vietnam - Vietnam 
- Ansell Kedah (Two major plants) - Malaysia 
- Ansell Textile Lanka - Sri lanka

I have successfully lead these project and got acknowledgement of efforts and work me and my team has delivered. Our main focus is to digitalise shop-floor and go Paper-less in terms of reporting and continue to adopt best industry practices using D365 Fin&Ops Production Control and Advance Warehousing.

projects.title: Implementation of DAX-365 for Operations at Qatar Red Crescent Services, Doha
projects.description:
Qatar Red Crescent is a volunteer charitable organisation that was established in March, 1978. It was an international recognition in 1981 by the International Committee of the Red Cross in Geneva, and joined the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent in the same year.

Recently, QDS has been set to implement Microsoft Dynamics AX 365 for Operation _ On Premises and I am being responsible to: 
- Analyse Procurement & Inventory 
- Prepare Fit Gap analysis documentation
- Drafting business flows using MS Visio for user acceptance
- Configuration of Procurement, Accounts Payable, Inventory Management and Product Information Management.
- Preparing Video training manuals for Users.

projects.title: ENOC _ AX 2012 RTM implementation
projects.description:
ENOC is the giant retail client posses a chain of Fuel pumps as well as Stores and Food courts, the client have two legal entities in the middle-east region one is in Dubai and the other one is in Saudi. 

My prime responsibility was to implement Standard Procurement and Sourcing module to strengthen their purchasing cycle plus filling the gaps by providing custom solutions. 

My duties were; 

1- Drafting Functional Requirement Document (FRD)
2- Drafting Functional Design Document (FDD)
3- Drafting Solution Design Document (SDD)
4- Preparing User Traing Manual along with standard UAT scripts as per SureSteps.
5- Maintaining Customization tracker List
6- Preparing Configuration and Setup Manual for Admin users. 
7- Virtual Config of the System to make procurement module operational. 
8- Configuration of Workflows.
9- Testing of Customized Solutions before UAT. 
10- Configuration of Vendor Request and Registration Cycle through EP.

profile_positions.description:
HSO is one of the reputed IT services and solution provider having strong foothold globally, especially EU and UK are key grounds: 
In this role, I will be acting as a lead consultant who is working closely with the team of other fellow consultants, solution architect, technical leads and BPO/SME’s to drive common project milestones/objectives. 
I will be more responsible to handle #Operation side of MS D365  Fin&Ops e.g. Procurement, Inventory, Sales, Product/Item, Production, Advance warehousing, Quality and Planning.
profile_positions.title: Lead Consultant Dynamics 365 F&O

profile_positions.description:
As ERP Senior Manager, my role is now expanded more towards leadership, I'm more responsible for overall ERP-roll-outs across Ansell manufacturing plants ensuring that designed/proposed solutions are meeting each Ansell manufacturing plant's requirement properly. 

ERP management includes managing the team of; 

- OTC (Order2Cash) 
- PTP (Procure to Pay)
- Production
- E2E Master Planning 
- Warehouse 
- Quality (QAQC) 
- MDM (Master Data management)
- Costing
- Finance 
- Compliance (Security) 

As of date, I have helped project team to successfully complete the roll out in 4 legal entities out of 9 e.g. Ansell Vietnam, Ansell Kedah A & B, Ansell Textile Lanka are now using D365 for their End-End transactional flow including a successful transformation of manual reporting into Business intelligence reporting (Power BI).
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager IT

profile_positions.description:
Ansell Limited, a global leader in protective solutions, is working with governments and health organizations worldwide. As a global leader in protection solutions, Ansell design, develop and manufacture a wide range of protection solutions that meet the ever-changing needs of global market.

Ansell- Malaysia has been announced as a winner of "Malaysia's Best Employer Brand 2018" in the award for Innovative in "Retention strategy" category.

Everyday about 13,000 people in 55 countries design, manufacture and market Ansell products that millions of workers and healthcare professional rely on.


- At Ansell, me as Lead ERP analyst is responsible for rolling out D365 Finance and Operation in APAC region.
- To be involved in end-end implementation for the activities covering Supply chain and Trade & Logistics Modules.
- As lead analyst, successfully implemented D365 Production control using advance warehouse features with some local requirements addressed through customization for Ansell Vietnam, Ansell Kedah Site A, Kedah Site B and Kedah Site C, now working out to roll-out fourth out of 9th legal entity.
- Business process owner (BPO) of Production Control team - rolling out production module using advance warehousing in D365 and comply with Master planning for EDI triggered Sales Orders (Global Demand) in D365. using latest gadgets and technology. 
- Assisting production shop-floor user to adopt the use of WMS (warehouse) application using mobile handheld devices, Zebra Printers, Bobbin printers, Posiflex touch screen, 3D bar-code scanners, Bar-code scanning tablets etc.
- Actively leading and managing a global internal team of Business analyst and process owners. - Analyzing, Designing, Unit Testing, UAT execution for key users, preparation of Test Scripts, User manuals and UAT sign off.
- Maintaining and managing Track-wise VSTS for development and other reported incidents.
- Connecting global team for latest update and reporting through MS teams and Smart sheets.
profile_positions.title: Lead Analyst, Applications (ERP/Legacy - D365 Fin&Ops) & Production Control BPO

profile_positions.description:
NORMA Group is a global market and technology leader in Engineered Joining Technology solutions, with more than 60 years of manufacturing and product-development experience. Norma's technological leadership has won NORMA Group the confidence of over 10,000 customers in more than 100 countries.

At Norma Group, I am; 
- Responsible for the implementation of MS Dynamics AX 2012 (R3 CU13)Logistics and Order management during global Dynamics AX roll-out project. 
- Currently deployed in APAC region (KUL- Malaysia) to support AX-APAC team for Pre/Post go live.
- Advance Warehouse management, Mobile Device, Production and Sales Purchase.
- Supporting EMEA users to help them to resolve their post go live Dynamics AX Operational issues using Classic Help desk. 
- Working with multiple ISV's and integrated AX solutions i.e. EDI, Bottomline etc.
profile_positions.title: AX Logistics and Order Management Analyst (Contractual Employee)

profile_positions.description:
Qatar Datamation Systems is a trusted technology solutions and services provider  and known as a big Microsoft partner when it comes to chose from a list of Microsoft partners in Qatar. QDS is helping his clients gain lasting competitive advantage by adopting innovation, change and operational excellence through a team of highly skilled, client-focused professionals utilising a blend of technology and proven concepts that achieve outstanding customer success.

I had been working on some of the gigantic clients such as AURA Fashions, Qatar Red Crescent and Amwaj Catering.

In this current role, my responsibilities are;

Efficiently led the Implementation of Supply Chain module.
Conducting fit gap analysis, preparing requirement, solution and design document relevant to Supply chain.
Preparing weekly progress status report considering the scope document and present it to the end user as well as internally to display the progress. 
Conducting end-user training i.e. UAT and other testing manuals to transfer AX functional knowledge. 
Implementing AX Dynamics 365 Supply chain modules 
Preparing Day-Day discussion within a conclusive document to summaries the progress, presenting business flow using Visio to elaborate client’s business processes and the same to be utilized for client's sign off for the requirements. 
Designing Workflows on MS Visio before configuring the same in AX and later configure the same in AX.
Importing supply chain data using Data management in D365. 
Preparing testing manuals using task recorder in D365 for user training purpose.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Team Lead - Dynamics 365 for Finance & Operations

profile_positions.description:
MazikGlobal is a well-known organization globally when it comes to Dynamics AX implementation and development, Mazik-Pakistan is a concerned legal entity of MazikGlobal operating here in Karachi, team consist of refined technical and functional consultants. 

I have been re-hired by Mazik and given a senior position to drive the Support Department as well as I will be engaged in on-going AX Implementation projects. Primarily, I will be responsible to look after our client INNOSPEC, a giant chemical group which is operational globally, client adopted Dynamics AX 2012 RTM and their system is integrated with multiple ISV's. 

In this current role, my responsibilities are; 

- Drafting Training Manuals as per SureSteps. 
- Conducting End user training. 
- Client Meetings for any ongoing implementation issues in order to accomplish this AX implementation smoothly. 
- Maintaining all the documentation and Issue logging though JIRA. 
- Providing detailed solutions to the business users. 
- Onsite and Offsite Reporting and Presentations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant _ MS Dynamics AX

profile_positions.description:
Systems Ltd "Pakistan First Software-house, is a Leading IT industry of Pakistan, as well as providing solutions and consulting services of MS Dynamics AX, their major business is AX Retail and their main focus is now towards Pakistan Retail Industry. 

Responsibilities includes; 

1- ETE AX Implementation.
2- User Training.
3- FRD's, fit gap analysis
4- After Implementation, training to "Core" Business heads.
5- Support to all AX clients on their users understanding issues.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Analyst

profile_positions.location: Ceasars Tower, Opst Aisha Bawani, Shahr-e-Faisal, Karachi, Pakistan
profile_positions.description:
Working In The Capacity Of Associate Functional Consultant, Key Responsibilities Includes:

 Assist Senior functional + technical consultants for the implementation of AX 2009 and AX 2012, core areas that I’m mostly involve in AX, are Project Management, HR & SCM Modules;
 Microsoft Dynamics AX R3, Retail _ Installation and configuration
 Dynamics AX Retail training and documentation. 
 Understand, document and evaluate the business practices / processes of the clients including: Accounts Receivables, Payables, Taxation (Including Indian taxation), Project Management, Supply Chain Management, Human Resource & map it with product.
 Gathering requirements on any modification or customization directly from the client and then create FRD’s for gaps identified and coordinate with the technical team for development and customization requirements.
 Create training document, Sure-Steps, Test Scripts and other KT documents for internal and external use.
 Conducting Project status meetings with client management.
 Providing detailed training to master users.
 Handling day to day queries raised by the end users & client management via Skype, GoToMeeting, TeamViewer and emails.
 On--job training and professional development of subordinates.
 Reporting to the Country and Service Delivery Manager directly for projects progress.

At my tenure till now with MazikGlobal I have worked on AX 2009 SCM modules, Bank, Administration module on BSI Steel Ltd (RSA), Furthermore, I had been the part of implementation of AX 2012 at our client Envac (Dubai), where we successfully implemented all AX modules excluding Production, we have worked on HR, Payroll, Product management, Fixed Asset, Project accounting and management, SCM modules, Budget modules.

I've recently started documenting AX 2012 R3 Retail, I'm covering the core components of Retail in Dynamics AX, how they work, what is the use. Plus, getting myself ready to add certification to my belt for the same.
profile_positions.title: Functional Consultant_Dynamics AX

profile_positions.description:
Mazik is Microsoft Gold-Partner the only software house working on MS Dynamics AX on a large extent, Worked In The Capacity Of Escalation Engineer _ MBS Division, Key Responsibilities Includes:
 Daily correspondence with live customers via emails.
 Record clients/user incidents and providing them solution.
 Reproduction/Escalation of the faults reported. 
 Detailed Documenting of the faults reported.
 Implementing the resolution of the issues as per client/user requirement.
 Reporting and tracking of incident via I.T help desk.
 Generating report of the incidents on weekly basis. 
 Updating client and team with incidents and following them up till accomplishment.

The experience at MazikGlobal as an Escalation Engineer enabled me to gain an understanding of trouble shooting, log tracking system, ITIL standards, SLA procedures and client management. The job role also groomed the skills of self decision making, analysis skills, risk management.
profile_positions.title: Support Escalation Engineer_ Dynamics AX

profile_positions.location: National I.T Park Tower, Shahr-e-Faisal, Karachi, Pakistan
profile_positions.description:
Worked In The Capacity Of Asst. Manager – E-commerce Support, Key Responsibilities Includes:

 Lead a team of junior business analysts and train them for client facing and trouble shooting.
 Explaining e-business plans to the employees and assigning daily task.
 Demonstrating team about the new e-marketing plans and update team with new suppliers and their product range.
 Ensuring 100% customer satisfaction by providing excellent customer services on our online stores e.g. www.gotapparel.com ; www.Amazon.com/gotapparelstore.
 Handling day to day queries raised by the end customer, web-users & client management.
 Providing live chat support through Live-chat tool.
 Regular status reporting to the management of the company and the client.

The experience at AmPak Internationals enabled me to gain an understanding of client facing, client interaction, client management, customer satisfaction, client relationship & good communication skills. AmPak is the most significant Employer among online business Industries that added values to my professional growth.
profile_positions.title: CSR Division _ Asst. Manager – E-commerce Support Amazon USA.

volunteer_experiences.description:

Role was to survey door to door and make people understand the real market of the Broad-band and the service provider, and also provide them awareness to maximize their level of satisfaction.
